title: Add Kawaii sticker asset and fix Quiz sticker image path

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded Kawaii sticker image to public generated assets using a sanitized filename and ensure it is directly loadable.
acceptanceCriteria: A new file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers-1.jpg` (or an equivalent sanitized filename that is lowercase, hyphen-separated, and contains no spaces/special characters).
Requesting `/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers-1.jpg` in the deployed app returns the image (no 404).

file_operations.description: Add the user-uploaded image asset (sanitized filename) so it is served as a static file at `/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers-1.jpg`.
Add the required generated image asset variant referenced by image requirements: `frontend/public/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers-1.dim_220x220.jpg`.

requirements.summary: Fix QuizSection corner sticker src to reference the real sanitized generated asset so it renders in both question and results cards.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSection.tsx`, both sticker `` elements currently using `src="/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers.jpg"` are updated to the sanitized, real path (e.g. `/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers-1.jpg`).
On the Quiz section, the sticker is visible on the question card view and remains visible on the results card view.
No new user-facing fallback text is introduced for the sticker; if the image loads successfully, there is no broken-image icon shown.

file_operations.description: Update both corner sticker `` `src` values to `/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers-1.jpg` (or the finalized sanitized filename) so the sticker renders in both question and results cards.
